titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of the MAGIC Foundation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 7/22/2013--Introduced. Expresses support for the goals and ideals of the MAGIC Foundation (a foundation dedicated to helping educate families and the public about growth failure in children).
